<a id="XRBodyTracker"></a>

# XRBodyTracker

**Experimental:** This class may be changed or removed in future versions.

**Inherits:** [XRPositionalTracker](XRPositionalTracker.md) **\<** [XRTracker](XRTracker.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A tracked body in XR.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

A body tracking system will create an instance of this object and add it to the [XRServer](XRServer.md). This tracking system will then obtain skeleton data, convert it to the Redot Humanoid skeleton and store this data on the **XRBodyTracker** object.

Use [XRBodyModifier3D](XRBodyModifier3D.md) to animate a body mesh using body tracking data.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [XR documentation index](../tutorials/xr/index.md)

The joint's orientation data is valid.<a id="XRBodyTracker_constant_JOINT_FLAG_ORIENTATION_TRACKED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[JointFlags](XRBodyTracker.md#enum_XRBodyTracker_JointFlags) **JOINT_FLAG_ORIENTATION_TRACKED** = `2`

The joint's orientation is actively tracked. May not be set if tracking has been temporarily lost.<a id="XRBodyTracker_constant_JOINT_FLAG_POSITION_VALID"></a>

The joint's position is actively tracked. May not be set if tracking has been temporarily lost.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Property Descriptions

<a id="XRBodyTracker_property_body_flags"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

**BitField**\[[BodyFlags](XRBodyTracker.md#enum_XRBodyTracker_BodyFlags)\] **body_flags** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#XRBodyTracker_property_body_flags)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_body_flags**\ (\ value\: **BitField**\[[BodyFlags](XRBodyTracker.md#enum_XRBodyTracker_BodyFlags)\]\ )
- **BitField**\[[BodyFlags](XRBodyTracker.md#enum_XRBodyTracker_BodyFlags)\] **get_body_flags**\ (\ )

The type of body tracking data captured.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="XRBodyTracker_property_has_tracking_data"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **has_tracking_data** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#XRBodyTracker_property_has_tracking_data)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_has_tracking_data**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_has_tracking_data**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the body tracking data is valid.

## Method Descriptions

<a id="XRBodyTracker_method_get_joint_flags"></a>

<!-- classref-method -->

**BitField**\[[JointFlags](XRBodyTracker.md#enum_XRBodyTracker_JointFlags)\] **get_joint_flags**\ (\ joint\: [Joint](XRBodyTracker.md#enum_XRBodyTracker_Joint)\ ) <span class="const">const</span> [ðŸ”—](#XRBodyTracker_method_get_joint_flags)

Returns flags about the validity of the tracking data for the given body joint.

Returns the transform for the given body joint.
